key.name: shift-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Shift modifier is active.

key.name: caps-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Caps Lock modifier is active.

key.name: control-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Control modifier is active.

key.name: alt-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Alt modifier is active.

key.name: num-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Num Lock modifier is active.

key.name: scroll-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Scroll Lock modifier is active.

key.name: super-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Super modifier is active.

key.name: altgr-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the AltGr modifier is active.
